DESCRIPTION: When using a Weapon card with the name attached, will get the attribute provided by the card.The upper limit of Weapons`s layer is 3, and the maximum number of equipment is 1.

When using a Weapon card with name, choose: if you already have a Weapon, increase the corresponding number of layers; otherwise, replace the attribute provided by the weapon before removing it;Or deal damage/gain block.

According to the type of Weapon, the attack effect is added. NL Sword:Apply 1 Weak after using AttackCard. NL Crossbow:Apply 2 poison after using AttackCard NL Shield:Gain 2 Block after using AttackCard NL Spear:Apply 1 Vulnerable after using AttackCard
Apply 1 Weak after using AttackCard
Gain 1 more Strength per BrokenSword .
Gain 1 more Strength per GanJiangMoYe .The first target you use each round is the enemy's attack card will be repeated N times.(N=Number of layers of GanJiangMoYe)
.Gain 1 more Strength per BloodthirstySword .After using attack card，Restores the damage N/6 times the health.(N=Number of layers of BloodthirstySword)
.Gain 1 more Strength per Excalibur .Start every turn, gain N TheContractOfVictory.(N=Number of layers of Excalibur)
Apply 2 poison after using AttackCard
Gain 1 more Strength per BrokenCrossbow .
Gain 3 more Strength per Hrunting .Apply N Weak after using attack card.(N=Number of layers of Hrunting)
Gain 2 block after using AttackCard
Gain 1 more Dexterity per BrokenShield .
Gain 1 more Dexterity per ExplosiveArmor .Gain 3 more Thorns per ExplosiveArmor.
Gain 1 more Dexterity per RhoAias .Gain Barricade. Each RhoAias reduce 3 damage
Apply 1 Vulnerable after using AttackCard
Gain 1 more Strength per BrokenSpear .
Gain 1 more Strength per GaeBolgBolg .Each GaeBolgBolg apply 2 ImprintOfDeath after using attack card.
Gain 1 more Strength per GaeBolg .Each GaeBolg gain 1 Metalization after using attack card.
At the end of the battle, each TheContractOfVictory adds 1 health response and maximum health.But the max of TheContractOfVictory is 10.
The number of Weapon` layer add 1.If the first Weapon` layer reach the upper limit, make the second  Weapon` layer add 1....
When you upgrade the card, you won't get any results.
Equip the upper limit of Weapon +1.
Temporarily make the upper limit of equipment Weapon +1，disappeared after being equipped with Weapon.Can only have 1 layer of Chaos at the same time. Lose this ability at the end of the round.
Damage all enemy that causes M times the sum of all current Weapon layers. Exhaust . Dancing . Ethereal
Gain the block of M times the sum of all current Weapon layers.Exhaust  . Ethereal
Forging .Exhaust  . Ethereal
Number of weapons equipped.
The sum of weapon layers of equipment.
After using card, gain 0.1 SkillPoint. When equipped with weapons, it will change: COMMON：0.2，UNCOMMON：0.4，RARE：1。Advanced cards require consume skill points to use。
Consumption of appropriate skill points before use.
Consumption of appropriate skill points before use.
Consumption of appropriate skill points before use.
Consumption of appropriate skill points before use.
When causing damage,get 1/6 times as much money as the damage.
When cards are expended，gain [E] 。
Attacked，the top 1 card of the draw pile are added to the discard pile, and the cost is reduced to 0 only once.
Attacked，the bottom 1 card of the draw pile are added to the discard pile, and the cost is reduced to 0 only once.
Increase all types of damage caused by 5.
After the victory of the battle, an additional relic was acquired.
Continue one turn and double the block.
For all types of damage, an additional 5% of the current max health is lost.
After the victory of the battle, an extra potion was obtained.
After the victory of the battle, an rare card was obtained.
The damage caused by the uncommon card or the block gained increased by 3, while the damage caused by the common card or the block gained decreased by 3.
Rare cards cause twice as much damage or gain blocks ,but common cards cause 1/2 less damage or gain blocks.(downward alignment)

The next attack deals 1 more damage per ImprintOfDeath.1 ImprintOfDeath is removed at end of turn.When the turn starts, if the ImprintOfDeath`s layer is greater than 10, give 50 fixed damage. Then remove all the ImprintOfDeath.
